title: A Sour Patch Kids Fast Food Invention, The Great Doubling Down Begins  07.06.22
itunes:title: A Sour Patch Kids Fast Food Invention, The Great Doubling Down Begins  07.06.22
description:
In episode 1281, Jack and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by writer, actor, director and co-host of The Dark Weeb, Brodie Reed, to discuss... The Great Doubling Down On The Status Quo, Sour Patch Kids Slushy From Sonic: The Latest Food Monstrosity to Distract Us and more!

  1. The Great Doubling Down On The Status Quo
  2. Sour Patch Kids Slushy From Sonic: The Latest Food Monstrosity to Distract Us
  3. SONIC’S SOUR PATCH KIDS SLUSH FLOAT: AN ABOMINATION?

LISTEN: Diddy Bop (feat. Cam O'bi & Raury) by Noname

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
